DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSections
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of cross sections in sequential order along the _Directrix_.

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixIs3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The curve entity which is the underlying directrix shall have the dimensionality of 3.

DocWhereRule.Name: ConsistentProfileTypes
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The profile type (either AREA or CURVE) shall be consistent within the list of the profiles defining the cross sections.

DocWhereRule.Name: SectionsSameType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The entity type for each section must be the same.
